Our Mechanical Teams have experienced and been qualified to do the process of installations together with our Electrical Teams.

Established

Dwi Tunggal Electric is a Company that has been established since 2007.

Electrical

Electrical is linked each other with Mechanical, therefore our Electrical Teams work closely with our Mechanical Teams.

Experienced

We have experience handling various projects on a small and large scale both inside and outside the city of Semarang in accordance with our company specialization.

Plumbing

Our Mechanical Teams also have experienced and been qualified to do the process of installations Plumbing and Clean water.

Grow Up

Our Company is currently expanding also to manufacture panels. We are a fairly developed Company in Central Java, precisely in the city of Semarang.
